title: Diabolist
summaries: The Diabolist is a Hardmode enemy found in the post-Plantera Dungeon. It is most common in areas backed by Tiled Walls. These are identified by the related Faction Flag, the Diabolic Sigil.

Diabolists attack by firing blazing magic bolts that can travel through <linked>blocks</linked> at the player. Their magic bolts explode, creating an "inferno", a large flaming sphere that lasts for nearly 4 seconds and deals massive damage on contact, inflicting the <linked>On Fire!</linked> <linked>debuff</linked>. Diabolists teleport to a different location on-screen every time they are hit.
